sentences.en: I acquit Edward of all essential misconduct.
sentences.cn: 我原谅爱德华的所有根本过错.

sentences.en: I am afraid of all my pains, I know that You will not acquit me.
sentences.cn: 伯9:28我因愁苦而惧怕 、 知道你必不以我为无辜.

sentences.en: I do not pretend tha t my protestations should acquit me.
sentences.cn: 我并不自称我的辩护一定能使自己无罪获释.

sentences.en: If I sin, then thou markest me, and thou wilt not acquit me from mine iniquity.
sentences.cn: 14我若犯罪, 你就察看我, 并不赦免我的罪孽.

sentences.en: Miss Manette , I am a man of business. I have a acquit myself of.
sentences.cn: 曼内特小姐, 我是个生意人, 我在执行一项业务工作.

sentences.en: NIV who acquit the guilty for a bribe, but deny justice to the innocent.
sentences.cn: [和合]他们因受贿赂, 就称恶人为17义,将义人的义夺去.

sentences.en: Shall I acquit a man with dishonest scales, with a bag of false weights?
sentences.cn: 11我若用不公道的天平和囊中诡诈的法码 、 岂可算为清洁 呢 .

sentences.en: Should you entertain my application favorably, I would spare to trouble acquit myself to your satisfaction.
sentences.cn: 假如本人之应征能歌德青睐而进入贵公司服务, 本人必以排除万难之决心,为贵公司工作,以符厚望.

sentences.en: That fact decided the judge to acquit him.
sentences.cn: 那个事实使法官判他无罪.

sentences.en: The judge directed the jury to acquit all the defendants.
sentences.cn: 法官指示陪审团裁定所有被告无罪.

sentences.en: They always acquit themselves of their duty very well.
sentences.cn: 他们总是很好地履行自己的职责.

sentences.en: They tried to bribe the judge to acquit them.
sentences.cn: 他们试图贿赂法官判他们无罪.

sentences.en: To acquit us with your products, please catalogue and other relative descriptive literatures.
sentences.cn: 为使我公司对你们的产品有全面的了解, 请寄产品目录等相关说明性文字材料.

sentences.en: Who acquit the criminal as a result of a bribe, But refuse righteousness to the righteous!
sentences.cn: 23他们因受贿赂, 就定恶人为义,将义人的义夺去.

sentences.en: Who can discern his errors? Acquit me of hidden faults.
sentences.cn: 12谁能知道自己的错失呢. 愿你赦免我隐而未现的过错.

words.tran_cn: 赦免；无罪开释；履行；尽职；（债务等的）清偿
无罪释放；表现；脱卸义务和责任；清偿

trans.tran_cn: 宣告无罪； 脱卸义务和责任； 还清
trans.tran_en: to give a decision in a court of law that someone is not guilty of a crime

trans.tran_cn: 宣判无罪，除去责任或义务，表现，履行，付清，还清
trans.tran_en: to give a decision in a court of law that someone is not guilty of a crime
